text: The 1942 Tour de Hongrie was the 12th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 27 to 29 June 1942. The race started in Budapest and finished in Nagyvárad. The race was won by Ferenc Barvik. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1942 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 27 June | Budapest to Nagyvárad | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text- align:right;" | 28 June | Nagyvárad to Kolozsvár | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 June | Kolozsvár to Nagyvárad | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text- align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text- align:center;" | 1 | | FTC | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text- align:center;" | 2 | | Postás | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 02" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | SKE | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 09" |} |} ==References== 1942 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
title: 1942 Tour de Hongrie
